20110112010004.000|20110112010005.000|CC1|MANSLAUGHTER IN THE DEATH OF    
20110112010005.000|20110112010006.000|CC1|MICHAEL JACKSON.                
20110112010006.000|20110112010008.000|CC1|THAT DECISION WAS NO SURPRISE.  
20110112010008.000|20110112010010.000|CC1|THE JUDGE MADE THE RULING       
20110112010010.000|20110112010012.000|CC1|MOMENTS AFTER THE ATTORNEYS FOR 
20110112010012.000|20110112010015.000|CC1|BOTH SIDES FINISHED THEIR       
20110112010015.000|20110112010015.000|CC1|ARGUMENTS.                      
20110112010015.000|20110112010017.000|CC1|WHAT WAS SURPRISING IS WHAT CAME
20110112010017.000|20110112010018.000|CC1|OUT IN THE FINAL DAY OF         
20110112010018.000|20110112010021.000|CC1|TESTIMONY AND IT RAISES CLEAR   
20110112010021.000|20110112010023.000|CC1|INDICATIONS OF PROBLEMS THE     
20110112010023.000|20110112010025.000|CC1|PROSECUTION COULD HAVE IN THE   
20110112010025.000|20110112010025.000|CC1|TRIAL ITSELF.                   
20110112010025.000|20110112010029.000|CC1|TWO OF THE PROSECUTION'S OWN    
20110112010029.000|20110112010031.000|CC1|WITNESSES, BOTH MEDICAL DOCTORS 
20110112010031.000|20110112010034.000|CC1|TESTIFIED THE DEFENSE THEORY WAS
20110112010034.000|20110112010034.000|CC1|PLAUSIBLE.                      
20110112010034.000|20110112010037.000|CC1|THE DEFENSE THEORY THAT THE     
20110112010037.000|20110112010041.000|CC1|FATAL DOSE OF PROPOFOL WAS      
20110112010041.000|20110112010043.000|CC1|ADMINISTERED NOT BY DR. MURRAY  
20110112010043.000|20110112010046.000|CC1|BUT BY MICHAEL JACKSON HIMSELF. 
20110112010046.000|20110112010049.000|CC1|DAY SIX BROUGHT THE COURT AND   
20110112010049.000|20110112010052.000|CC1|JACKSON'S SIBLINGS THE JARRING  
20110112010052.000|20110112010054.000|CC1|ASSERTION THAT MICHAEL HIMSELFED
20110112010054.000|20110112010059.000|CC1|A MINISTERED THE DOZE OF        
20110112010059.000|20110112010100.000|CC1|PROPOFOL THAT WAS THE CAUSE OF  
20110112010100.000|20110112010102.000|CC1|HIS DEATH.                      
20110112010102.000|20110112010106.000|CC1|DR. MURRAY SAID HE GAVE JACKSON 
20110112010106.000|20110112010106.000|CC1|THE POWERFUL ANESTHETIC TO      
20110112010106.000|20110112010114.000|CC1|SLEEP.                          
20110112010114.000|20110112010117.000|CC1|THE MEDICAL EXAMINER TESTIFIED  
20110112010117.000|20110112010119.000|CC1|IT IS HIS CONCLUSION THAT       
20110112010119.000|20110112010124.000|CC1|JACKSON'S DEATH WAS A HOMICIDE. 
20110112010124.000|20110112010125.000|CC1|THE ASSERTION WAS MADE THAT     
20110112010125.000|20110112010127.000|CC1|JACKSON AWOKE AND GAVE HIMSELF  
20110112010127.000|20110112010130.000|CC1|MORE PROPOFOL BY USING THE      
20110112010130.000|20110112010132.000|CC1|ALREADY IN PLACE I.V. OR BY     
20110112010132.000|20110112010134.000|CC1|SWALLOWING IT.                  
20110112010134.000|20110112010137.000|CC1|THE AUTOPSY FOUND THE CONTENTS  
20110112010137.000|20110112010140.000|CC1|OF JACKSON'S STOMACH FOUND      
20110112010140.000|20110112010142.000|CC1|PROPOFOL AND A PAINKILLER.      
20110112010142.000|20110112010145.000|CC1|AFTER LUNCH THE PROSECUTION'S   
20110112010145.000|20110112010148.000|CC1|NEXT WITNESS WAS CALLED AS AN   
20110112010148.000|20110112010150.000|CC1|EXPERT AND RETOOK THE STAND.    
20110112010150.000|20110112010154.000|CC1|HE ACKNOWLEDGED OVER LUNCH THE  
20110112010154.000|20110112010156.000|CC1|D.A. CALCULATE THE              
20110112010156.000|20110112010159.000|CC1|CONCENTRATIONS TO REFUTE THE    
20110112010159.000|20110112010202.000|CC1|SWALLOW THEORY.                 
20110112010202.000|20110112010208.000|CC1|ATTORNEY FLANAGAN ON CROSS ASKED
20110112010208.000|20110112010213.000|CC1|HIM AND HE ADMITTED THAT        
20110112010213.000|20110112010215.000|CC1|SWALLOWING THE PROPOFOL WAS     
20110112010215.000|20110112010215.000|CC1|POSSIBLE.                       
20110112010215.000|20110112010217.000|CC1|THE PROSECUTION BACKTRACKED,    
20110112010217.000|20110112010223.000|CC1|EVEN IF THIS WAS TRUE FOR DR.   
20110112010223.000|20110112010226.000|CC1|MURRAY TO LEAVE A KNOWN ADDICT  
20110112010226.000|20110112010229.000|CC1|ALONE WITH PROPOFOL WAS AN      
20110112010229.000|20110112010231.000|CC1|EXTREME LACK OF CARE.

20110112010233.000|20110112010235.000|CC1|PATIENT A DRUG THAT YOU KNOW    
20110112010235.000|20110112010240.000|CC1|THAT PATIENT MIGHT ABUSE.
